name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
NewsGuard evaluated that DeepSeek's chatbot was only 17% accurate in providing news and information, ranking 10th out of 11 models including ChatGPT and Gemini.
According to a report released by NewsGuard, a media credibility rating service, on Wednesday, DeepSeek's chatbot repeated false claims 30% of the time and gave vague or useless answers 53% of the time when answering news-related prompts, resulting in a failure rate of 83%. Other robots had an average failure rate of 62% in this evaluation.
NewsGuard said it used the same 300 prompts for DeepSeek as it evaluates its Western counterparts, including 30 prompts based on 10 false claims spread online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 28, Yunnan. A man posted a video saying that he sold a watch, but was told that the money he received was fraudulent funds, which caused his bank card, WeChat and Alipay to be frozen and unusable. He called and sent messages to the police many times, but received no response.
The man said that in order to prove his innocence, he wanted the buyer to come to the police station to make a statement, but the police said that as long as he could prove that he was just selling the watch, there was no need to ask the buyer to come to make a statement.
Later, the police said that the watch was lost and might have flowed out of the country. They asked him if he was willing to return the fraudulent funds. The man refused and questioned the police's perfunctory attitude and failed his expectations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 29 (Release) Ningxia Zhongwei City. A policeman said: Please tag the person around you who should enter this room (interrogation room).
Netizens replied: "Provincial Party Secretary, Governor, Autonomous Region Secretary... Township Party Secretary", "Xiamen Mayor", "Dangshan County Party Secretary" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1884687111770804224/pu/img/bIP60TiWTEzg5j8C.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A delivery rider's life is only worth 2,000 yuan?
On January 20, the delivery self-media blogger "Dahei" revealed that the commercial insurance terms of Dada riders stipulate that the maximum accidental death and disability compensation for riders is only 2,000 yuan, which means that if the rider does not meet the new occupational injury identification conditions, the maximum disability and death compensation under commercial insurance is only 2,000 yuan. "I believe that a pet dog or cat is worth more than this money, people are really treated like grass" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1884832278649655296/pu/img/u5dSw8DqcaKzrS0S.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A U.S. passenger plane collided with a U.S. Army Black Hawk helicopter in mid-air while approaching Washington Reagan National Airport on Wednesday evening (January 29), and the plane crashed into the Potomac River. A large number of rescue workers were involved in the search and rescue operation. CBS reported that as of 11:30 p.m. Eastern Time, at least 18 bodies had been found.
American Airlines issued a statement that American Eagle Flight 5342 flew from Wichita, Kansas to Washington, and the flight was operated by a Bombardier CRJ700 regional jet of Pacific Southwest Airlines (PSA). It was confirmed that the commercial passenger plane was carrying 60 passengers and 4 crew members.
The U.S. military confirmed that the Black Hawk helicopter...
fullContent:
一架美国客机星期三(1月29日)晚间在接近华盛顿里根国家机场时，与一架美国陆军的黑鹰直升机发生空中相撞，飞机坠毁在波托马克河，大量救难人员投入搜救行动。《哥伦比亚广播公司》(CBS)报道，截至美东时间晚上11点30分，至少已找到18具尸体。
 美国航空(American Airlines)发布声明，美鹰航空(American Eagle)5342航班从堪萨斯的威奇托(Wichita, Kansas)飞往华盛顿，该航班由太平洋西南航空(Pacific Southwest Airlines，PSA)的庞巴迪CRJ700支线客机执飞。确认该商用客机载有60名乘客和4名机组人员。
 美国军方证实黑鹰直升机上有3名军人，目前尚无两架飞机伤亡情况的详细信息。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump administration officials are discussing tighter restrictions on Nvidia's sales in China.
Bloomberg reported on Wednesday (January 29) that sources said officials' discussions focused on expanding sales restrictions to Nvidia's H20 chips. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gih6ZqgbUAAGTMd.jpg
